trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There were no other sightings in Chicago on or around August 20th 2011
Summary: Air and Sea show event, many people witness the 2 sphere lights.
divs: Sighting DetailsAs soon as the fight jet went straight up in the sky, every one around notice 2 sphere lights glowing, nobody thought that was a UFO because of many airplanes doing acrobats. I was recording with my Iphone 3gs, when I notice the lights thinking that was another airplane, but the jet went up and down, but the lights stayed for about 5 minutes and than disappear. I asked everyone around if they saw, and everyone saw the light.
